modules.title: Go Basics
modules.description: Learn the fundamental concepts and syntax of Go programming
modules.longDescription: Start your Go journey by learning the core syntax, data types, and control structures that make up the foundation of Go programming.
learningObjectives: Understand Go syntax and basic program structure
Work with variables, data types, and operators
Implement control flow with conditionals and loops

modules.title: Data Structures
modules.description: Master arrays, slices, maps and other Go data structures
modules.longDescription: Explore Go's built-in data structures and learn how to effectively organize and manage your data in Go programs.
learningObjectives: Use structs to create custom data types

modules.title: Concurrency
modules.description: Learn Go's powerful concurrency features with goroutines and channels
modules.longDescription: Dive into Go's signature concurrency model using goroutines and channels to write efficient concurrent programs.
learningObjectives: Understand goroutines and how they work
Use channels for communication between goroutines

modules.title: Web Development
modules.description: Build web servers and REST APIs using Go's standard library
modules.longDescription: Learn to create robust web servers and RESTful APIs using Go's powerful standard library and popular web frameworks.
learningObjectives: Create a basic web server with the net/http package
Connect to databases from Go web applications

modules.title: Advanced Go
modules.description: Explore advanced Go concepts like reflection, interfaces, and testing
modules.longDescription: Take your Go skills to the next level by mastering advanced concepts that will make your code more robust, maintainable, and efficient.
learningObjectives: Work with the Go toolchain effectively

modules.title: Go Projects
modules.description: Apply your Go skills in real-world projects
modules.longDescription: Put everything you've learned to use by building complete, practical applications with Go.
learningObjectives: Develop a concurrent data processing application
Deploy Go applications to production environments
